name: ReStore - Habitat for Humanity
materials: Carpet; Carpet Padding; Ceiling Tiles; Ceramic Tiles; Linoleum; Windows; Wood; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
ReStore is a home improvement resale store benefiting Habitat for Humanity. ReStore accepts donated materials from retailers, wholesalers, distributors, contractors, and homeowners. ReStore then sells the material at bargain prices to the general public. Proceeds build Habitat homes.

ReStore carries new and gently used home improvement material such as windows, doors, lighting, trim, lumber, millwork, flooring, tile, carpet, tools, hardware, cabinetry, plumbing, electrical. For more information, see www.ReStoreElgin.org, or for national ReStore information, see www.habitat.org website.
